ideals.text: Tradition. The old ways are the best ways, and I must preserve them.
Freedom. Everyone should be free to chart their own course.
Power. The only way to get what you want is to be strong enough to take it.
Knowledge. The pursuit of knowledge is the highest calling.
Community. We are all stronger together, and I must protect my community.
Greed. I'm just in it for the coin.
Beauty. The world is a dark place; I will fill it with beauty.
Aspiration. I will climb the social ladder, no matter the cost.
Honor. My word is my bond, and a stain on my honor is a stain on my soul.
Logic. Emotions are a weakness; every decision must be based on pure reason.

bonds.text: I am fiercely loyal to my immediate commander.
Everything I do is for my family and the honor of our name.
I will do anything to protect the members of my guild.
My hometown is the most important place in the world to me.
I owe a life debt to an old adventurer who once saved me.
I'm pursuing a personal vendetta against the person who wronged my family.
I cherish a simple keepsake that connects me to my past.
I am in love with someone from a rival family or organization.
I will protect the natural world from those who would exploit it.
The secrets I keep are not my own; I hold them for a friend.

flaws.text: I am secretly terrified of magic and distrust all spellcasters.
I have a crippling gambling addiction.
I see conspiracies everywhere and trust no one.
I am a sucker for a pretty face and easily charmed.
Once someone questions my courage, I will do anything to prove them wrong, no matter how reckless.
I am convinced of my own superiority and look down on others.
I cannot resist a puzzle or a secret, even if it leads me into danger.
I have no respect for authority and will always talk back to it.
I am haunted by a mistake I made in my past and seek absolution.
I will say anything to avoid hard work.
